actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ghast makes one Bite attack and two Claws attacks. If one Bite attack and at least one Claws attack hit a creature that isn't a Construct or Undead, the target must succeed on a DC 13 CON save or contract ghoul hunger (see the Ghoul Hunger sidebar).

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 8 (2d4+3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature that isn't a Construct or Undead, it must succeed on a DC 13 CON save or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

special_abilities.name: Hungry Dead Nature
special_abilities.desc: The ghast doesn't require air or sleep. In addition, it must consume at least 2 pounds of raw meat every 24 hours, or it loses its immunity to exhaustion and risks starvation until it does so. While it has any levels of exhaustion from starvation, the ghast can't remove levels of exhaustion until it consumes at least 4 pounds of raw meat.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The ghast can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilities.name: Stench
special_abilities.desc: A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast must succeed on a DC 13 CON save or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a success, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Turning Defiance
special_abilities.desc: The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saves against effects that turn undead.

special_abilities.name: Undead Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The ghast is immune to poison damage, to exhaustion, and to the poisoned condition.
